entries.journal_entry_description: An Imperial Officer in Hangar Bay 1 has information that Mira wants. Go dance for him and then get the information.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: There is an Imperial Officer in Hangar Bay 1, using it as a makeshift office. Tell him that you have been sent to entertain him. He should be in the room off to the side of the main hangar bay.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Talk to the Imperial Officer in Hangar Bay 1
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Dance for the Imperial Officer for 1 minute, using flourishes to keep his interest. Flourishes allow Entertainers to become more proficient at their craft. To dance, click on the Start Dance icon and then right-click in the main screen. You can do special moves by left-clicking on a flourish button and the right-clicking on your character. To stop dancing, left-click on the Stop Dance icon and right-click on your character.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Dance for the Imperial Officer in Docking Bay 1
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have entertained him, find out why the Imperial Officer is on the station.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Get Information from the Imperial Officer in Docking Bay 1
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You know about a shipment that the Imperials are searching for. Return to Mira and tell her what you learned.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Return to Mira in the Cantina
